languages.text: {n}Голос Соломона звучит твердо, даже грубо.{/n} "Прошу внести в протокол. Действия Вольного Торговца не могут быть предметом разбирательств. Они совершались в моем присутствии, а значит — были санкционированы {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}". {n}Проктор грозно выпячивает грудь, будто пытается принять вражеский удар.{/n}

{n}Solomorne's voice is firm, almost to the point of rudeness.{/n} "I request that the following note be added to the record: the Rogue Trader's actions are not to be scrutinised. They were carried out in my presence and thus had the approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}." {n}Solomorne thrusts his chest out imposingly, as if trying to deflect an enemy blow directed at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Соломона звучит твердо, даже грубо.{/n} "Прошу внести в протокол. Действия Вольного Торговца не могут быть предметом разбирательств. Они совершались в моем присутствии, а значит — были санкционированы {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}". {n}Проктор грозно выпячивает грудь, будто пытается принять вражеский удар.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is firm to the point of discourtesy.{/n} "I request that the following note be added to the record: the Rogue Trader's actions cannot be put under scrutiny. {mf|He|She} was acting in my presence, and therefore {mf|he|she} had the approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}." {n}Solomorne sticks out his chest imposingly as if trying to take an enemy blow directed at you.{/n}

{n}Solomorne's voice is firm, almost to the point of rudeness.{/n} "I request that the following note be added to the record: the Rogue Trader's actions are not to be scrutinised. They were carried out in my presence and thus had the approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}." {n}Solomorne thrusts his chest out imposingly, as if trying to deflect an enemy blow directed at you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Stimme ist fest, beinahe unhöflich.{/n} "Ich möchte, dass die Aufzeichnung um folgende Notiz erweitert wird: die Aktionen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sind nicht zu hinterfragen. Sie wurden in meiner Gegenwart ausgeführt und hatten damit die Zustimmung des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}." {n}Solomorne wirft sich stolz in die Brust, als wolle er einen auf dich ausgeführten Hieb abfangen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is firm, almost to the point of rudeness.{/n} "I request that the following note be added to the record: the Rogue Trader's actions are not to be scrutinised. They were carried out in my presence and thus had the approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}." {n}Solomorne thrusts his chest out imposingly, as if trying to deflect an enemy blow directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Stimme ist fest, beinahe unhöflich.{/n} "Ich möchte, dass die Aufzeichnung um folgende Notiz erweitert wird: die Aktionen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sind nicht zu hinterfragen. Sie wurden in meiner Gegenwart ausgeführt und hatten damit die Zustimmung des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}." {n}Solomorne wirft sich stolz in die Brust, als wolle er einen auf dich ausgeführten Hieb abfangen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne s'exprime avec une fermeté qui frise l'impolitesse.{/n} « Je demande à ce que la note suivante soit ajoutée au dossier : les actes {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ne doivent en aucun cas être remis en cause. Ils ont été effectués en ma présence, et donc avec l'approbation de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. » {n}Il bombe le torse pour se rendre plus imposant, comme s'il voulait vous protéger d'une attaque ennemie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is firm, almost to the point of rudeness.{/n} "I request that the following note be added to the record: the Rogue Trader's actions are not to be scrutinised. They were carried out in my presence and thus had the approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}." {n}Solomorne thrusts his chest out imposingly, as if trying to deflect an enemy blow directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne s'exprime avec une fermeté qui frise l'impolitesse.{/n} « Je demande à ce que la note suivante soit ajoutée au dossier : les actes {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ne doivent en aucun cas être remis en cause. Ils ont été effectués en ma présence, et donc avec l'approbation de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. » {n}Il bombe le torse pour se rendre plus imposant, comme s'il voulait vous protéger d'une attaque ennemie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙以坚定的声音开了口，态度几乎到了粗鲁的程度。{/n}“我要求在记录中添加以下备注内容：行商浪人的行为不应该受到审查，因为所有行为都是我在场的情况下执行的。因此，上述行为等同于得到了{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}帝国法务部{/g}批准。”{n}索罗蒙气势汹汹地挺着胸膛，仿佛想替你挡住敌人的攻击一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is firm, almost to the point of rudeness.{/n} "I request that the following note be added to the record: the Rogue Trader's actions are not to be scrutinised. They were carried out in my presence and thus had the approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}." {n}Solomorne thrusts his chest out imposingly, as if trying to deflect an enemy blow directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙以坚定的声音开了口，态度几乎到了粗鲁的程度。{/n}“我要求在记录中添加以下备注内容：行商浪人的行为不应该受到审查，因为所有行为都是我在场的情况下执行的。因此，上述行为等同于得到了{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}帝国法务部{/g}批准。”{n}索罗蒙气势汹汹地挺着胸膛，仿佛想替你挡住敌人的攻击一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La voz de Solomorne es firme, casi grosera.{/n} «Solicito que se añada la siguiente nota al registro: las acciones de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente no están sujetas a escrutinio. Fueron realizadas en mi presencia y por lo tanto con aprobación del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}». {n}Solomorne saca pecho, como si quisiera desviar un ataque dirigido contra ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is firm, almost to the point of rudeness.{/n} "I request that the following note be added to the record: the Rogue Trader's actions are not to be scrutinised. They were carried out in my presence and thus had the approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}." {n}Solomorne thrusts his chest out imposingly, as if trying to deflect an enemy blow directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Solomorne es firme, casi grosera.{/n} «Solicito que se añada la siguiente nota al registro: las acciones de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente no están sujetas a escrutinio. Fueron realizadas en mi presencia y por lo tanto con aprobación del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}». {n}Solomorne saca pecho, como si quisiera desviar un ataque dirigido contra ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの声は、ほとんど無礼なほどに毅然としている。{/n}「私は、記録に以下の注記を追加することを要請します。ローグトレーダーの行動は精査されるべきものではありません。それらは私の立ち会いのもとで実行され、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}高等裁定局{/g}の承認を得ています」{n}ソロモーンは堂々と胸を突き出し、まるであなたに向けられた敵の一撃を逸らそうとするかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is firm, almost to the point of rudeness.{/n} "I request that the following note be added to the record: the Rogue Trader's actions are not to be scrutinised. They were carried out in my presence and thus had the approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}." {n}Solomorne thrusts his chest out imposingly, as if trying to deflect an enemy blow directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの声は、ほとんど無礼なほどに毅然としている。{/n}「私は、記録に以下の注記を追加することを要請します。ローグトレーダーの行動は精査されるべきものではありません。それらは私の立ち会いのもとで実行され、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}高等裁定局{/g}の承認を得ています」{n}ソロモーンは堂々と胸を突き出し、まるであなたに向けられた敵の一撃を逸らそうとするかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un sesi kesin, kaba görünecek kadar sert çıkıyor.{/n} "Şu notun kayda geçmesini talep ederim: Hür Tacir'in fiilleri sorgulanmayacaktır. Zira bunlar benim huzurumda icra edilmiş ve böylece {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites'in{/g} tasvibini almıştır." {n}Sanki sana yönelmiş bir darbeyi saptırır gibi göğsünü kabartıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is firm, almost to the point of rudeness.{/n} "I request that the following note be added to the record: the Rogue Trader's actions are not to be scrutinised. They were carried out in my presence and thus had the approval of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}." {n}Solomorne thrusts his chest out imposingly, as if trying to deflect an enemy blow directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un sesi kesin, kaba görünecek kadar serttir.{/n} "Şu notun kayda geçmesini talep ederim: Hür Tacir'in fiilleri sorgulanmayacaktır. Zira bunlar benim huzurumda icra edilmiş ve böylece {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}'in tasvibini almıştır." {n}Sanki sana yönelmiş bir darbeyi saptırır gibi göğsünü kabartır.{/n}
